entries.title: Turmoil and Protests Shake Latin America
entries.description: Riots in Brazil and Peru are the latest in a groundswell of discontent that political analysts and citizens say is driven by corruption, inequality and lack of state services.

entries.title: Russia and Belarus Stage Military Exercises on Ukraine's Border in Show of Force
entries.description: The air-force exercises are an effort to boost cooperation ahead of what some expect to be a fresh Russian offensive in the coming months.

entries.title: China Promotes National-Security Chief to Top Hong Kong Post
entries.description: Beijing signaled its intention to maintain a tough line on Hong Kong by promoting Zheng Yanxiong, a law enforcer sanctioned by the U.S., to its top representative post in the city.

entries.title: Nepal Recovers Black Box From Yeti Airlines Crash
entries.description: Authorities recovered the flight recorders and another body from the wreckage, bringing the death toll to 69 people.

entries.title: Italian Police Arrest Most-Wanted Sicilian Mafia Boss
entries.description: Italy’s Carabinieri military police have detained the country’s most notorious fugitive mafia boss, who had been on the run for 30 years, at a private hospital on the outskirts of Palermo.

entries.title: Chinese and Local Workers Clash at Indonesia Nickel Smelter, Leaving Two Dead
entries.description: Part of the facility in Central Sulawesi was burned down amid the violence.

entries.title: Embattled German Defense Minister Resigns
entries.description: Christine Lambrecht had faced criticism for the slow pace of defense overhauls and military aid to Kyiv.

entries.title: Iran Plans Penalties for Women Breaking Hijab Rule
entries.description: Fines range from women being ordered to perform community service to an international travel ban.

entries.title: Globalization Isn't Dead. But a Shake-Up Is Building.
entries.description: Multinational companies still want cheap and efficient markets, but they also want safety. That’s why they’re rerouting the pathways of global trade and finance.

entries.title: Dozens of Russian Draftees Died in a Ukrainian Strike. Putin's War Machine Rolled On.
entries.description: A New Year’s Day attack on an army barracks has rattled soldiers and families but not dented Russia’s reluctant resolve.
